definitions: with a cautious distrust or suspicion of someone or something

examples.text: women have been eyed suspiciously by the Party

shortDefinitions: with cautious distrust or suspicion of someone or something

definitions: in a way that arouses suspicion or distrust

examples.text: he was arrested after behaving suspiciously
the group was suspiciously quiet about their activities

shortDefinitions: in way that arouses suspicion or distrust
